simpledc.title: Philosophy at Cambridge, Newsletter of the Faculty of Philosophy
simpledc.subject: Philosophy
Newsletter
simpledc.description: Philosophy Newsletter. Articles by: Jane Heal - From the Chair. David Waterman - Too Beautiful to Be True. Simon Blackburn - Who's the Tops?. The Heffer Lecture 2006. The Forum for Philosophy in Business. Arif Ahmed - Why Believe the Axioms?. Matthew Parris - Chauvinist Days. Laura Biron - Scepticism at Red Alert. Steffi Lewis - Who'd be a Fundraiser? Faculty News.
simpledc.publisher: Faculty of Philosophy, University of Cambridge
